name: 音灵 INVAXION - 《2:3》
detailed_description:
Collaboration between INVAXION and ilem is now officially online! “2:3”, the latest music album produced by ilem and also the first involvement of Bilibili in releasing music album for their website's content creators, quickly went viral within the listeners right after released. Being the representative producer of Chinese Vocaloid, ilem's fame started from Bilibili with his catchy tunes and meme-vibe music video, and being more than just an internet viral as his songs were also featured in various TV shows!

This DLC contains 4 new songs in addition:
勾指起誓
夜间出租车
大氿歌
得过且过的勇者

A limited “2:3” theme Spaceship will also be featured in the game at the same time.
about_the_game:

short_description: INVAXION x ilem collab is now online! New tracks: “勾指起誓”, “夜间出租车”, “大氿歌” and “得过切过的勇者" be added to the game in the form of DLC, and it came with a free theme! The DLC will be free for a limited time, so don't miss out the good deal!
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, English, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo/AMD AthlonII X2
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 530
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-7400/AMD Rayzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
